headline: GTA Online
subtitle: INDEPENDENCE DAY 2018: Discounts
content:
Star spangled Independence Day content is returning to GTA Online all week long at a discounted rate through July 9th, with 40% off the following:

Vapid Liberator
Western Motorcycle Company Sovereign
Musket
Firework Launcher & Fireworks

And much more. Check out the Rockstar Newswire for all the details.
